com.blockhaus2000.util.resources

Class ResourceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.blockhaus2000.util.resources.ResourceManager

  • public class ResourceManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will initialize the resources from the given Objects. See JavaDoc below to see the exact implementation.
    Author:
    Blockhaus2000

    • Method Detail

      • initializeResources

        public static void initializeResources(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                       java.lang.Object obj)
                                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                       java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Initializes the resources from the given Class for the Object that are marked with a resource-annotation (fro example, MainPluginResource). If one of the fields that have to be initialized is non-static, the given Object cannot be null.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The Class where the fields with the annotations are.
        obj - The Object that has to be initialized.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Will be throwed if one of the Fields is non-static and the given Object is null or Field.set(Object, Object) will throw it.
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - Will be throwed if Field.set(Object, Object) will throw it.

      • initializeResources

        public static void initializeResources(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
                                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                       java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Initializes the Fields in the given Class that are marked with a resource annotation (for example, MainPluginResource). This method will call initializeResources(Class, Object). See there for the full JavaDoc.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The Class with the fields that has to be initialized.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Will be throwed if initializeResources(Class, Object) will throw it.
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - Will be throwed if initializeResources(Class, Object) will throw it.
        See Also:
        initializeResources(Class, Object)

      • initializeResources

        public static void initializeResources(java.lang.Object obj)
                                throws java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Initializes the Fields in the given Object that are marked with a resource annotation (for example, MainPluginResource). This method will call initializeResources(Class, Object). See there for the full JavaDoc.
        Parameters:
        obj - The Object with the field that has to be initialized.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Will be throwed if initializeResources(Class, Object) will throw it.
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - Will be throwed if initializeResources(Class, Object) will throw it.
        See Also:
        initializeResources(Class, Object)

      • registerResource

        public void registerResource(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> anot,
                    java.lang.Object obj)
        Adds a resource annotation and an object to use for this ResourceManager (the usage if like the usage of the MainPluginResource annotation).
        Parameters:
        anot - The resource-annotation.
        obj - The object that has to be associated with the given annotation.

      • getInstance

        public static ResourceManager getInstance()
        Returns:
        An instance of the ResourceManager.
